[images]
type = download

# list of base URLs to original image files:
url = http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/

# local cache directory (can become very large):
localpath = ~/en-images

# list of known templates used for declaring image licenses on image description
# pages:
knownlicenses = GFDL cc-by-sa


[wiki]
type = net

name = The Free Encyclopedia
url = http://en.wikipedia.org/

# URL for article pages:
articleurl=http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=@TITLE@&action=raw

# whitespace-separated list of URLs for image description pages (if more than
# one URL is specified, the order must match the order of the list of URLs in
# the url attribute of the [images] section):
imagedescriptionurls = http://commons.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Image:@TITLE@&action=raw

# URLs for template pages. The URLs are tried in order, thus it's possible to
# override temlates later in this list:
templateurls = http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:@TITLE@&action=raw

# title of article containing the license text for articles in this MediaWiki:
defaultarticlelicense = GFDL
